text: The COVID-19 pandemic was confirmed to have reached Sudan in March 2020. On 13 March 2020, Sudan reported its first COVID-19 case in Khartoum, a man who died on 12 March 2020 and had visited the United Arab Emirates in the first week of March. Sudan stopped issuing visas for, and flights to, eight countries, including Italy and neighboring Egypt, over fears of the coronavirus outbreak. ==References== Category:2020s in Sudan Sudan
title: COVID-19 pandemic in Sudan
